Bar Plot

Function Keywords

x::AbstractVector
y::AbstractArray
stack::Union{Bool, AbstractVector, Void} = nothing
horizontal::Bool = false
kwargs...(modifies top-level `EChart` fields)

Single Series

using ECharts
x = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"]
y = [11, 11, 15, 13, 12, 13, 10]
bar(x, y)

Single Series - kwargsâ€¦

using ECharts
x = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"]
y = [11, 11, 15, 13, 12, 13, 10]
bar(x, y, color = ["green"])

Multiple Series

using ECharts
x = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"]
y = [11, 11, 15, 13, 12, 13, 10]
bar(x, hcat(y,y,y))

Stacked Bar - All

using ECharts
x = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"]
y = [11, 11, 15, 13, 12, 13, 10]
bar(x, hcat(0.95 .* y, 1.25 .* y,y), mark = "bar", color = ["red", "gray", "blue"], stack = true)

Stacked Bar - Different groups

using ECharts
x = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"]
y = [11, 11, 15, 13, 12, 13, 10]
bar(x, hcat(0.95 .* y, 1.25 .* y,y), mark = "bar", color = ["red", "gray", "blue"], stack = [1,1,2])

Stacked Bar - Different groups, horizontal

using ECharts
x = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"]
y = [11, 11, 15, 13, 12, 13, 10]
bar(x, hcat(0.95 .* y, 1.25 .* y,y), mark = "bar", color = ["red", "gray", "blue"], stack = [1,1,2], horizontal = true)
